pkgmetadata.longdescription: PARAFAC Analysis of Fluorescence Excitation-Emission Matrices // Perform parallel factor analysis (PARAFAC: Hitchcock, 1927) doi:10.1002/sapm192761164 on fluorescence excitation-emission matrices: handle scattering signal and inner filter effect, scale the dataset, fit the model; perform split-half validation or jack-knifing. Modified approaches such as Whittaker interpolation, randomised split-half, and fluorescence and scattering model estimation are also available. The package has a low dependency footprint and has been tested on a wide range of R versions.
